remarks: Convert a quantification over a triple to a conjunction.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2015.)
statement:
raltp.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
raltp.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
raltp.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
raltp.4 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
raltp.5 $e |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
raltp.6 $e |- ( x = C -> ( ph <-> th ) ) $.
raltp $p |- ( A. x e. { A , B , C } ph <-> ( ps /\ ch /\ th ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ps x $.
$d th x $.
